Reference documentation for IDL-Grouplib

Author:
Volker Springel
Max-Planck-Institute for Astrophysics
Garching, Germany
volker@mpa-garching.mpg.de

This C-library is meant to be called by IDL (or other languages) and provides an easy-to-use interface for the groupcatalogues generated by the FOF algorithm of L-GADGET2.
